page.title: 17Sutton in 100 Years.
page.content: I think that in 100 years Sutton will be all amusement arcades and it will be very busy.There will be a lot moe shops and I think that they will knock all the old shops down and build new ones.There might be a leisure centre and a fair.There will probably be a bigger school and a Nuclear Power Station.I don't think there will be an 11+ either.There will be an airport with lots of planes flying everywhere. There will be conveyer belts in the shops and electric doors which you have to sat a password to open {-Matthew Lockley. I think that Sutton on Sea will be spoilt by skyscrapers and cars and pollution but there will be advantages because there will be bigger shops and stores and people will not have to walk all over town looking for certain shops{-Mark Edwards.
